previewArticle.title: Russia vs. South Korea: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group H Preview

recapArticle.title: Russia 1, South Korea 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group H Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: αdiℓ
timelineItems.text: KICK OFF! #RUS @TeamRussia 0:0 @theKFA #KOR #RUSvsKOR #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Gabriella Alberti
timelineItems.text: Russia's jersey is as elegant as a Bolshoj ballet. #inlove #RussiaKorea #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Viktor Faizulin (Russia) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Han Kook-Young (South Korea).

timelineItems.name: Graeme Campbell
timelineItems.text: Flippin' 'eck South Korea are good #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Son Heung-Min (South Korea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high. Assisted by Koo Ja-Cheol.

timelineItems.name: Bobby Garcha
timelineItems.text: It's games like this Russia v South Korea game where the commentators really earn their money #WorldCup2014 #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: YANKEES✗
timelineItems.text: Korea are losing so many chances!!#brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Son Heung-Min (South Korea).
Aleksandr Samedov (Russia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Danyal Effendi

timelineItems.text: A South Korean fan looks on Watch live http://t.co/q0NtiRxqth #Brazil2014 http://t.co/pE0RijUxGa

timelineItems.name: jonnny
timelineItems.text: This #korea team is looking really sharp! #bbcworldcup #WorldCup2014 #WorldCup #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Dj Mystical |Gh|
timelineItems.text: Watching all matches #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: ᴵ ᴬᴹ Lloyd®
timelineItems.text: So... #Russia is the only side with all 23 men playing in their own domestic league...#RESPECT that I must say. #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Kim Young-Gwon (South Korea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alexander Kokorin (Russia).

timelineItems.name: Liam Gent
timelineItems.text: Finish work watch football. Go to football. Come home and watch football. Pretty sweet life at the moment #Brazil2014 #Lovethegame #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Beccy Harvey
timelineItems.text: ..and the booing towards the #RUS side has started. Good. C'mon #KOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Russia 1, South Korea 1.

timelineItems.name: Rokewood
timelineItems.text: No imagination & poor finishing from 2 second-tier sides tonight #WorldCup #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 49 goals so far at the World Cup, most through 17 #WorldCup games since 1958.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Arjen Robben now has six career #WorldCup goals. Johnny Rep is the only Dutchman with more (7).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Busy #WorldCup day ahead: Netherlands & Chile could advance. Spain (!) is 1 of 4 teams that could be eliminated.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: AUS-NED: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN ESP-CHI, 2:30 ET, ESPN CMR-CRO, 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 7 - Arjen Robben has scored seven goals in his last seven appearances for #NED. Threat. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 11 - #NED are unbeaten in their last 11 #WorldCup group stage matches, winning eight and drawing three. Juggernaut.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Tim Cahill has five career #WorldCup goals. All other Australians have a total of five.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Aleksandr Samedov (Russia) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Viktor Faizulin with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Benigno Piñera
timelineItems.text: Russia have the edge over South Korea, statistically. More #WorldCup analysis here: http://t.co/7jNO1aU291 http://t.co/JR8eV0kNCM”

timelineItems.name: Benigno Piñera
timelineItems.text: Russia have the edge over South Korea, statistically. More #WorldCup analysis here: http://t.co/7jNO1aU291 http://t.co/JR8eV0kNCM”

timelineItems.name: Lo Rider
timelineItems.text: In #Brazil they get the day off to watch the match. Just saying. Brazil knows what’s up. #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Ki Sung-Yueng (South Korea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Denis Glushakov (Russia).

timelineItems.name: Daniel Quinn
timelineItems.text: Slow game so far... #RUSKOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Sky Sports Football
timelineItems.text: #RUS and #KOR fans both in fine spirits ahead of their Group H opener in Curitiba: http://t.co/2izyb8F4XX #WorldCup http://t.co/6N11eDMo3r

timelineItems.name: Robin McKay
timelineItems.text: I predicted 2-0 to Russia but this seems at the moment to have 0-0 written all over it #football #worldcup #superbru

timelineItems.name: The HMS Bounty
timelineItems.text: #Koreatown is alive for their first #WorldCup match today!

Kim Young-Gwon (South Korea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: FIFA Pitch Invasion
timelineItems.text: Good challenges, not much fussing about and midfield concentration - that's what #WorldCup should be about! #RUSvsKOR

timelineItems.name: Darya
timelineItems.text: It's almost 2 a.m. I woke up to watch the game Russia - Korea Republic. #WorldCup #russiavssouthkorea #RUSvsKOR

timelineItems.comment: Aleksandr Samedov (Russia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ki Sung-Yueng (South Korea).

timelineItems.name: Ann
timelineItems.text: I get the feeling that KOR spent a lot of time on fancy footwork drills, not a lot actually playing. RUS isn't even there. ��#WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Drew
timelineItems.text: That ref's combover is a marvel. #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt saved. Sergei Ignashevitch (Russia) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Delay in match Aleksandr Samedov (Russia) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Yuri Zhirkov (Russia) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Alexander Kokorin.

timelineItems.name: stephen
timelineItems.text: What a rocket by IgnaShevich! Holy crap. #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Koo Ja-Cheol (South Korea) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  South Korea. Conceded by Sergei Ignashevitch.

timelineItems.name: Sam Reck
timelineItems.text: What's with all the long shots recently? Lack of invention, nerves? #WorldCup #bbcworldcup

timelineItems.name: Cutch
timelineItems.text: South Korea just looks like they are having a great time out there, and the Russians look pissed #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: We cant have two 0-0 draws in a row can we!? Hopefully not. #worldcup #RUSvKOR

timelineItems.name: ღSкуяιм ρяιи¢єѕѕღ
timelineItems.text: Just so you know I'm very much going for #SouthKorea In this match #WorldCup2014 #RUSvsKOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Mikayla Spring
timelineItems.text: Let's go Russia! #motherrussia #WorldCup #WorldCup2014 #RUSvsKOR #RUS

timelineItems.name: Kasper Sardar
timelineItems.text: #RUSvsKOR This game is becoming more & more open as the minutes tick by! Good open end to end stuff so far #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Alexander Kokorin (Russia).
Hong Jeong-Ho (South Korea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay in match Hong Jeong-Ho (South Korea) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Michael Tsoi
timelineItems.text: Korea should be running away with this game. Russia's very lucky to still be tied. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: World Cup 2014
timelineItems.text: National anthems over, ready to go! #RUS #KOR #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Son Heung-Min (South Korea) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Park Chu-Young with a headed pass.
Foul by Park Chu-Young (South Korea).

Foul by Koo Ja-Cheol (South Korea).
Denis Glushakov (Russia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Alberto Nardelli
timelineItems.text: Korea's Rooney. #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  South Korea. Conceded by Vassili Berezoutski.

timelineItems.name: Chris Hawkes
timelineItems.text: Korea have some silky passing!! #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: James Andre
timelineItems.text: Not understanding #Korea 's play. Seems like a lot of missed opportunities. #worldcup #fifa

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Russia 0, South Korea 0.

timelineItems.name: Tribal Football
timelineItems.text: Largely uneventful opening 45 minutes. Neither Russia or South Korea able to create any real goalscoring chances. 0-0 in Cuiaba. #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Russia 0, South Korea 0.
Attempt saved. Viktor Faizulin (Russia) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Oleg Shatov.
Corner,  Russia. Conceded by Jung Sung-Ryong.
Attempt missed. Vassili Berezoutski (Russia) header from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Dmitriy Kombarov with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Samuel Whiting
timelineItems.text: Would like Russia to win but they are not attacking enough! #RUSvsKOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oleg Shatov (Russia).
Koo Ja-Cheol (South Korea) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Foul by Viktor Faizulin (Russia).
Han Kook-Young (South Korea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Chang
timelineItems.text: It's good to see the game finally picking up pace. #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  South Korea. Conceded by Sergei Ignashevitch.

timelineItems.name: Nick Richardson
timelineItems.text: Martin Keown isnt happy with this game's keeper 'It looks like he takes an age to get down, he goes down in instalments' #topbant #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Alexander Kokorin (Russia).
Ki Sung-Yueng (South Korea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: UP Pastry Plate
timelineItems.text: Alright, Hil's got this. Going back to #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Tony Tannous
timelineItems.text: Don't think either is gonna be disappointed with a pt. Korea probing, but measured. Capello has Russia's d organised #RUSvsKOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Alexander Kokorin (Russia).

timelineItems.name: Luis Charalambous
timelineItems.text: Would've thought #RUS would be up by at least 1 goal given #KOR poor farewell match results #WorldCup #RUSKOR

timelineItems.name: Moss Moseh

timelineItems.name: Nhlanhla Ntsele
timelineItems.text: These koreans play nice football though #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Nhlanhla Ntsele
timelineItems.text: Koreans deserve to win this game #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Korvan Morkintish
timelineItems.text: Come on, Korea! My encouragement helped Belgium, it can help you, too. #WorldCup #RUS #KOR #BEL

timelineItems.name: Marc W Gomes
timelineItems.text: Russia is really disappointing so far, I honestly expected more of them #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Daniel O'Connell
timelineItems.text: 'How about these 0-0 draws at the #WorldCup? One doesn't happen for a long time and then there are lots, just like a domestic bus service.'

timelineItems.name: Cicelyp
timelineItems.text: This goalie is on point. #korea #worldcup

timelineItems.name: ida
timelineItems.text: It is really fun to watch South Korea play #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Muna Michael
timelineItems.text: Nigeria has infected this #WorldCup with goalless draw abilities.

timelineItems.name: Ewan Mubs
timelineItems.text: That's been coming #Akinfeev #RUS #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Matthew Davies
timelineItems.text: This World Cup could be the biggest upset in football yet #Brazil2014

timelineItems.text: The Russians don't know what there getting into #TeamKorea #Brazil2014 #RUSvsKOR

timelineItems.text: Finally a goal, but still a shocking game. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Daniel Shanney
timelineItems.text: That was worth staying up for #Clown #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Cicelyp
timelineItems.text: Wow. He was in for 8 seconds. #russia #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Colin Harvey
timelineItems.text: #RUS could win this now, as long as #KOR don't have another shot on target. #RUSvsKOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Malcolm C
timelineItems.text: This Korea Russia game has been surprisingly entertaining. Yet another exciting day of soccer. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Sean Murray
timelineItems.text: Why did Dzagoev not start this game? Has made such a difference since coming on. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Daniel Quinn
timelineItems.text: Questionable eleven from cappello. Dzagoev is one of their stars & kerzahkov is most experienced. They gotta start. #RUSKOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  South Korea. Conceded by Dmitriy Kombarov.

timelineItems.text: Russia slowly annexing the final third of the pitch here.... #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Adam Martin-Lawrence
timelineItems.text: I have high hopes for this game.... Mainly cause I have Russia in my sweepstake #RUS #RUSvsKOR #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: #AZZURRI
timelineItems.text: One of the most entertaining matches in the #worldcup #RUSvsKOR am happy I stayed awake to watch this one.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Raub
timelineItems.text: Clearly, the #Russian goalkeeper left his Impenetrable #Ochoa Wall in Moscow. #lpcelebrazil #WorldCup #RUSvsKOR

timelineItems.name: Andy
timelineItems.text: It's not unusual to see wave after wave of Russian attack #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: John Papa
timelineItems.text: Love how tight these games have been in the #WorldCup ... exciting to see the passion from Russia and South Korea on display

timelineItems.name: Joseph Holding
timelineItems.text: It's taken me a week to notice, but the #WorldCup hasn't actually been to South America since 1978. That's an incredible gap.

timelineItems.name: Sarah Cobb
timelineItems.text: The #WorldCup today had been all about the substitutes #gamechangers

timelineItems.name: Nakul Pande
timelineItems.text: #Akinfeev hasn't been tested anywhere near enough since his error. South Korea should have been shooting on sight. #RUS #KOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Koo Ja-Cheol (South Korea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alan Dzagoev (Russia).

timelineItems.name: Abrar Ahmed
timelineItems.text: The tempo of the game has come down since that period with Russia dominating possession against a much more tired Korea #WorldCup #RUSvsKOR

timelineItems.name: BRIANMICHAELSETH
timelineItems.text: No matter how limited this Russian team is,you'd have to expect more considering the money Capello is making #WorldCup
